.. _module1_operators_expressions_comments:

Module 1: Operators, Expressions, and Comments
==============================================

Operators
---------

- Arithmetic, relational, logical, bitwise, assignment, membership, identity

Expressions
-----------

- Expression evaluation
- Precedence & associativity

Comments
--------

- Single-line: `# comment`
- Multi-line: triple quotes or multiple `#`
